title: React Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of React and component-based development.
content: React is one of the most widely used libraries for building interactive user interfaces. Learn components, props, state, and build responsive UIs.

title: Node.js Guide
description: Understand backend development with Node.js.
content: Node.js powers platforms on the web. Learn asynchronous programming, event-driven architecture, and building APIs with real-world projects.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Why Python is the go-to language for data analysis and AI.
content: Learn Python basics, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and scikit-learn. Analyze real datasets and prepare for AI-driven projects.

title: Database Essentials
description: SQL vs NoSQL: Learn how to choose the right database.
content: Understand relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases, design schemas, write queries, and optimize performance.

title: Git & GitHub
description: Master version control and collaborative coding with GitHub.
content: Learn Git basics, branching, merging, pull requests, and collaborate effectively using GitHub with real project exercises.

title: HTML & CSS
description: Build beautiful, responsive websites from scratch.
content: Learn HTML structure, CSS styling, flexbox, grid, responsive design, and create landing pages and portfolios.

title: Docker Essentials
description: Learn containerization with Docker to streamline deployments.
content: Understand Docker images, containers, and Compose. Deploy apps consistently and improve portability with containerization.

title: Kubernetes Basics
description: Orchestrate containers at scale using Kubernetes.
content: Learn pods, deployments, services, clusters, and scale containerized applications effectively using Kubernetes.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Explore cloud services and infrastructure using AWS.
content: Get started with AWS services: EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda. Deploy scalable applications with security and cost optimization.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introduction to AI and machine learning concepts.
content: Learn supervised & unsupervised learning, classification, regression, clustering using Python and scikit-learn.

title: Angular Development
description: Master Angular for building scalable web applications.
content: Learn TypeScript, Angular modules, components, services, routing, and build enterprise-level apps.

title: DevOps Fundamentals
description: Streamline development and operations with DevOps practices.
content: Learn CI/CD pipelines, automation, monitoring, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, and improve collaboration.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build cross-platform apps with React Native.
content: Learn React Native, reusable components, navigation, device APIs, and build real mobile apps for Android & iOS.

title: Soft Skills for Developers
description: Improve communication, teamwork, and career success.
content: Learn communication, problem-solving, time management, teamwork, leadership, and professional growth skills.

title: Portfolio & Interview Prep
description: Build a strong portfolio and ace technical interviews.
content: Build a professional portfolio, prepare coding interviews, resume, LinkedIn, and improve communication skills.

title: React Native Advanced
description: Take React Native skills to the next level.
content: Build advanced mobile apps using React Native, animations, performance optimization, and native modules.

title: MongoDB Essentials
description: Learn NoSQL database management with MongoDB.
content: Understand MongoDB CRUD operations, aggregation, indexing, schema design, and integration with Node.js.

title: Next.js Development
description: Build server-side rendered React apps using Next.js.
content: Learn Next.js pages, routing, API routes, SSR, SSG, and building SEO-friendly React applications.

title: Python Web Development
description: Build web apps using Python frameworks.
content: Learn Flask and Django to create web apps, handle databases, and build RESTful APIs with Python.

title: Bootstrap 5 Essentials
description: Quickly design responsive websites with Bootstrap 5.
content: Learn Bootstrap 5 grid, utilities, components, and responsive design to speed up frontend development.

title: Tailwind CSS Mastery
description: Style modern websites efficiently using Tailwind CSS.
content: Learn Tailwind CSS utility classes, responsive design, custom themes, and best practices for modern UI development.

title: API Development with REST
description: Build scalable APIs using REST architecture.
content: Learn designing RESTful APIs, handling requests, responses, authentication, and best practices for backend development.

title: Docker & Kubernetes
description: Combine containerization and orchestration for modern deployments.
content: Learn Docker containers, images, Compose, Kubernetes clusters, pods, and deployments for scalable apps.

title: AWS Cloud Architect
description: Design scalable cloud infrastructure with AWS.
content: Learn AWS EC2, S3, Lambda, networking, and deployment of cloud-native applications.

title: CI/CD Pipelines
description: Automate software delivery using CI/CD pipelines.
content: Learn Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI to automate build, test, and deployment processes.

title: Advanced Python
description: Take Python skills to advanced levels.
content: Learn decorators, generators, context managers, multithreading, and advanced data structures in Python.

title: React + Redux
description: Manage global state efficiently with Redux.
content: Learn Redux, actions, reducers, store, middleware, and integrating Redux with React applications.

title: Portfolio Projects
description: Build a complete portfolio to showcase your skills.
content: Create portfolio projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and deploy online for professional presentation.

title: AI for Beginners
description: Understand the basics of artificial intelligence and its applications.
content: Learn AI fundamentals, machine learning concepts, data preprocessing, and simple AI projects using Python.

title: Data Visualization with Python
description: Transform data into meaningful insights through visuals.
content: Learn Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly to create impactful visualizations and communicate data effectively.

title: React Router Mastery
description: Manage navigation in React apps efficiently with React Router.
content: Learn routing concepts, nested routes, dynamic routes, and protect routes using React Router v6.

title: Advanced CSS Techniques
description: Enhance web design with modern CSS techniques.
content: Learn CSS Grid, Flexbox, animations, transitions, and responsive design for modern web applications.

title: Serverless Development
description: Build scalable apps without managing servers.
content: Learn serverless concepts using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and deploying applications with minimal infrastructure.

title: Firebase for Web & Mobile
description: Integrate Firebase for backend services in web and mobile apps.
content: Learn Firebase authentication, Firestore database, storage, and real-time applications for web and mobile.

title: Data Analytics with Excel
description: Use Excel for powerful data analysis.
content: Learn Excel formulas, pivot tables, charts, and data cleaning techniques for effective analytics.

title: Web Accessibility Standards
description: Make your web applications accessible to everyone.
content: Learn WCAG guidelines, ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, and best practices for inclusive web design.

title: Blockchain Basics
description: Understand blockchain technology and its applications.
content: Learn blockchain fundamentals, smart contracts, Ethereum, and build simple decentralized applications.

title: Ethical Hacking Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of ethical hacking and cybersecurity.
content: Understand penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and tools like Metasploit and Wireshark for ethical hacking.

title: Introduction to Quantum Computing
description: Explore the principles of quantum computing.
content: Learn quantum bits, superposition, entanglement, and basic quantum algorithms.

title: Introduction to Augmented Reality
description: Discover the basics of augmented reality development.
content: Learn AR concepts, tools like ARKit and ARCore, and build simple augmented reality applications.

title: Introduction to Virtual Reality
description: Get started with virtual reality development.
content: Learn VR concepts, tools like Unity and Unreal Engine, and create immersive virtual reality experiences.

title: Introduction to Internet of Things (IoT)
description: Explore IoT concepts and build connected devices.
content: Learn IoT architecture, protocols, sensors, and build simple IoT projects using Raspberry Pi or Arduino.

title: Introduction to Natural Language Processing (NLP)
description: Understand the basics of NLP and text processing.
content: Learn text preprocessing, sentiment analysis, and basic NLP tasks using Python libraries like NLTK and spaCy.

title: Introduction to Data Engineering
description: Learn the fundamentals of data engineering and ETL processes.
content: Understand data pipelines, ETL processes, data warehousing, and tools like Apache Spark and Airflow.

title: Introduction to Game Development
description: Get started with game development using Unity.
content: Learn Unity basics, C# scripting, game physics, and build simple 2D and 3D games.

title: Introduction to Data Privacy
description: Understand data privacy laws and best practices.
content: Learn GDPR, CCPA, data protection techniques, and how to handle personal data responsibly.

title: Introduction to Digital Marketing
description: Explore digital marketing strategies and tools.
content: Learn SEO, content marketing, social media marketing, and analytics tools for effective online marketing.

title: Introduction to Cloud Security
description: Learn how to secure cloud environments and applications.
content: Understand cloud security principles, identity management, encryption, and compliance in cloud environments.

title: Introduction to Ethical AI
description: Explore ethical considerations in AI development.
content: Learn fairness, accountability, transparency, and bias mitigation in AI systems.

title: Introduction to Data Science with R
description: Get started with data science using R programming.
content: Learn R basics, data manipulation, visualization, and statistical analysis for data science projects.

title: Introduction to Quantum Machine Learning
description: Combine quantum computing and machine learning concepts.
content: Learn quantum algorithms for machine learning, quantum data representation, and basic quantum circuits.

title: Introduction to Edge Computing
description: Explore edge computing concepts and applications.
content: Learn edge computing architecture, IoT integration, and real-time data processing at the edge.

title: Introduction to 5G Technology
description: Understand the fundamentals of 5G networks and applications.
content: Learn 5G architecture, use cases, and how it impacts IoT, AR/VR, and smart cities.

title: Introduction to Data Ethics
description: Explore ethical considerations in data collection and usage.
content: Learn data ethics principles, responsible data usage, privacy concerns, and ethical AI practices.

title: Introduction to Augmented Reality Development
description: Get started with AR development using ARKit and ARCore.
content: Learn AR concepts, tools, and build simple augmented reality applications for mobile devices.

title: Introduction to Virtual Reality Development
description: Explore VR development using Unity and Unreal Engine.
content: Learn VR concepts, tools, and create immersive virtual reality experiences for gaming and training.

title: Introduction to Data Visualization with Tableau
description: Create interactive visualizations using Tableau.
content: Learn Tableau basics, data connections, dashboards, and storytelling with data visualizations.

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity and threat management.
content: Learn cybersecurity principles, threat detection, incident response, and best practices for securing systems.

title: Introduction to Data Warehousing
description: Learn data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
content: Understand data warehousing architecture, ETL tools, and data modeling for analytics.

title: Introduction to Blockchain Development
description: Get started with blockchain development using Ethereum.
content: Learn smart contracts, Solidity programming, and build decentralized applications on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with TensorFlow
description: Explore machine learning concepts using TensorFlow.
content: Learn TensorFlow basics, neural networks, and build machine learning models for various applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Python
description: Get started with data science using Python programming.
content: Learn Python libraries for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning for data science projects.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing with Azure
description: Explore cloud computing concepts using Microsoft Azure.
content: Learn Azure services, deployment models, and build cloud-native applications on Microsoft Azure.

title: Introduction to Data Science with SQL
description: Learn SQL for data analysis and manipulation.
content: Understand SQL queries, joins, aggregations, and data manipulation for data science applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Pandas
description: Use Pandas for data manipulation and analysis in Python.
content: Learn Pandas DataFrames, data cleaning, transformations, and exploratory data analysis techniques.

title: Introduction to Data Science with NumPy
description: Explore numerical computing with NumPy in Python.
content: Learn NumPy arrays, mathematical operations, and array manipulations for scientific computing.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Matplotlib
description: Visualize data using Matplotlib in Python.
content: Learn Matplotlib basics, plotting techniques, and creating visualizations for data analysis.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Seaborn
description: Create statistical visualizations using Seaborn in Python.
content: Learn Seaborn aesthetics, categorical plots, and statistical visualizations for data exploration.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Scikit-learn
description: Build machine learning models using Scikit-learn in Python.
content: Learn Scikit-learn basics, model training, evaluation, and building predictive models for data science applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Keras
description: Build deep learning models using Keras in Python.
content: Learn Keras basics, neural networks, and building deep learning models for image and text classification.

title: Introduction to Data Science with PyTorch
description: Explore deep learning with PyTorch in Python.
content: Learn PyTorch tensors, autograd, and building neural networks for various machine learning tasks.

title: Introduction to Data Science with SciPy
description: Use SciPy for scientific computing in Python.
content: Learn SciPy libraries, optimization, integration, and signal processing for scientific applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Statsmodels
description: Perform statistical modeling using Statsmodels in Python.
content: Learn Statsmodels basics, regression analysis, hypothesis testing, and statistical inference techniques.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Plotly
description: Create interactive visualizations using Plotly in Python.
content: Learn Plotly basics, creating interactive plots, dashboards, and web-based visualizations for data analysis.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Bokeh
description: Build interactive visualizations using Bokeh in Python.
content: Learn Bokeh basics, creating interactive plots, dashboards, and web applications for data visualization.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Dask
description: Scale data processing with Dask in Python.
content: Learn Dask for parallel computing, handling large datasets, and distributed data processing in Python.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Vaex
description: Explore large datasets efficiently with Vaex in Python.
content: Learn Vaex for out-of-core DataFrames, lazy evaluation, and fast data exploration techniques.

title: Introduction to Data Science with H2O.ai
description: Build machine learning models using H2O.ai in Python.
content: Learn H2O.ai for scalable machine learning, AutoML, and building predictive models for big data.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Spark
description: Process big data using Apache Spark in Python.
content: Learn Spark DataFrames, RDDs, and distributed data processing for big data analytics.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Flink
description: Stream processing with Apache Flink in Python.
content: Learn Flink for real-time data processing, stream analytics, and building scalable data pipelines.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Kafka
description: Build real-time data pipelines using Apache Kafka.
content: Learn Kafka basics, producers, consumers, and building real-time streaming applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Airflow
description: Orchestrate data workflows using Apache Airflow.
content: Learn Airflow for scheduling, monitoring, and managing complex data workflows and ETL processes.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Beam
description: Build unified batch and stream processing pipelines with Apache Beam.
content: Learn Beam for writing data processing pipelines that can run on various execution engines like Spark and Flink.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Cassandra
description: Explore NoSQL databases using Apache Cassandra.
content: Learn Cassandra for distributed databases, data modeling, and building scalable applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Hadoop
description: Process big data using Apache Hadoop ecosystem.
content: Learn Hadoop HDFS, MapReduce, and building big data applications using the Hadoop ecosystem.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Spark MLlib
description: Build machine learning models using Spark MLlib.
content: Learn Spark MLlib for scalable machine learning, feature engineering, and building predictive models.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Spark GraphX
description: Analyze graph data using Spark GraphX.
content: Learn GraphX for graph processing, graph algorithms, and building graph-based applications.

title: Introduction to Data Science with Apache Spark Streaming
description: Stream processing with Apache Spark Streaming.
content: Learn Spark Streaming for real-time data processing, windowing, and building streaming applications.
